name: Space Python
description:
My second game project, but the first one I entirely code !

I build it in Python in three weeks, and learned that way a lot of cool stuff that I will use in my future game project !

Hope you'll enjoy it ;)

The controls are pretty simple :

ARROW_UP / SPACE - Fire

ARROW_LEFT - Go to the left of the screen

ARROW_RIGHT - Go to the right of the screen

ESC - Pause or leave the game

Leave me a comment, it's encouraging !

Have a nice day ;)
